API Documentation¶

class urlshots.API¶

This is the UrlShots API client.

Parameters:
  • delay (int) – Delay in seconds after loading before screenshotting (default: 0)
  • jpeg (int) – JPEG compression; 0 means no JPEG, return a PNG instead (default: 75)
  • compress (int) – Whether to compress a PNG to an 8-bit indexed image (defalt: 0)
  • timeout (int) – Timeout when hitting the API (default: 20)
  • actions (str) – Actions chain as a string (default: None)
  • concurrency (str) – Maximum connection pool size for use in multithreaded or concurrent applications (default: 1)
  • window (tuple) – Size of the capture window to use as a tuple of (width, height) (default: (1260, 840))
  • host (str) – UrlShots API hostname (default: 'urlshots.net')
